events.title: The First Hello
events.description: Where it all began. A simple message that changed everything.

events.title: The Night I Fell for Your Voice
events.description: The first time we spoke, time slowed down. Your laugh, your pauses, the way you said my name — that was the moment my heart quietly chose you.

events.title: Seeing You for the First Time
events.description: When our screens lit up and I saw you smile, the world faded away. That video call wasn’t just pixels — it was the beginning of something beautifully real.

events.title: The First Time I Held You
events.description: Standing in front of you felt surreal. When I finally saw you in person, every mile, every wait, every heartbeat led to that one unforgettable moment.

events.title: Forever & Always
events.description: Every day is a new page in our beautiful story. I love you more than ever.
